document_data.caption: The location of the East Torchtower on a circa [[1357 DR]] map of [[Waterdeep]]
document_data.name: East Torch Tower
document_data.mainbody: '''East Torch Tower''' was the formal name given to one of the major torchtowers of [[Waterdeep]]'s [[Trollwall]], located in the city's [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]].The sourcebook ''[[City System]]'' states that all torchtowers with names are "major towers".
document_data.Location: This tower was situated next to the Dock Ward's [[Guard Barracks/Dock Ward|Guard Barracks]].The sourcebook ''[[City of Splendors: Waterdeep]]'' incorrectly states that this is part of the [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]].

Structure.Interior: Being a torchtower, East Torch Tower had all the features that were common among them. This included a debriefing room, a small armory, holding cells, storage rooms for the holding of evidence or confiscated items, some bedchambers, and some garderobes.{{Cite web/theedverse/2021-10-17 - Waterdeep's Torchtowers}}  Additionally, being a major torchtower, it had six small holding cells that could hold up to ten people, which were used in times of trouble.<ref><ref group="note" name="major" />

document_data.Activities: Like all other torchtowers, this structure had three beacon-fires that were constantly kept on standby.
document_data.Inhabitants: East Torch Tower, like all torchtowers, was manned by members of the [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]].
